Package it.disi.unitn.videocreator

Class TracksMerger

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.VideoCreator
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.TracksMerger
public class TracksMerger extends VideoCreator
A class that helps merge audio and video tracks.

      public TracksMerger(@NotNull @NotNull FFMpegBuilder builder, @NotNull @NotNull String outputFile, @NotNull @NotNull String inputFolder, @NotNull @NotNull String pattern, @NotNull @NotNull String audioInput, @NotNull @NotNull String videoInput) throws NotEnoughArgumentsException
      The class's constructor.
      Parameters:
      builder - The FFMpegBuilderInstance
      outputFile - The path to the output video
      inputFolder - The path to the input folder
      pattern - The name of the file to be included in the video
      audioInput - The path to the input audio file
      videoInput - The path to the input video file
      Throws:
      NotEnoughArgumentsException - If any of the arguments given to this method is null or an empty string

      public TracksMerger(@NotNull @NotNull FFMpegBuilder builder, @NotNull @NotNull String outputVideo, @NotNull @NotNull String inputFolder, @NotNull @NotNull String pattern) throws NotEnoughArgumentsException
      The class's constructor. This constructor should only be called when the program is about to create the output video.
      Parameters:
      builder - The FFMpegBuilderInstance
      outputVideo - The path to the output video
      inputFolder - The path to the input folder
      pattern - The name of the file to be included in the video
      Throws:
      NotEnoughArgumentsException - If any of the arguments given to this method is null or an empty string

  • Method Details

    • streamCopy

      public void streamCopy(boolean val)
      This method enables (or disables) the stream-copy option.
      Parameters:
      val - A boolean value used to denote whether the tracks should be stream-copied

    • mergeAudioWithVideo

      public void mergeAudioWithVideo(long time, @NotNull @NotNull TimeUnit timeUnit) throws NotEnoughArgumentsException, IOException
      This method sets the correct command to merge the audio and video tracks.
      Parameters:
      time - The maximum amount of time to wait for the video's creation
      timeUnit - The TimeUnit instance to be used
      Throws:
      NotEnoughArgumentsException - when the video input path or audio input path is null
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs

    • mergeVideos

      public void mergeVideos(long time, @NotNull @NotNull TimeUnit timeUnit, @NotNull @NotNull List<String> inputFiles, @NotNull @NotNull String tempFile) throws IOException, InvalidArgumentException, NotEnoughArgumentsException
      This method allows any object of this class to concatenate two or more videos whose path is given as input.
      Parameters:
      time - The maximum amount of time to wait for the video's creation
      timeUnit - The TimeUnit instance to be used
      inputFiles - The paths to the input files
      tempFile - A temporary file used to store the paths of the files to be merged
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments given to this method is null, an empty string, is less than or equal to zero, or it contains null or empty strings
      NotEnoughArgumentsException - If any of the given arguments is less than or equal to zero, null or an empty string or contains null or empty strings
